description.value: Scenario 2.3 - Serve PDF/A DocumentManifest - Serve all PDFA DocumentManifest resources of person 2 with a current status and created in the period from T-365 to T-60. Response consists of 1 DocumentManifest resource of person 2.
Date that data and queries are expected to be relative to.
OAuth Token for patient XXX_Schulte

Test XIS Server query search operation for known DocumentManifest resources of person 2 with a current status and created in period from T-365 to T-60. The expected response code is 200(OK) and content is a searchset Bundle resource where 1 DocumentManifest entries are returned in XML format.
XIS Server query search operation for known DocumentManifest resources with a current state and created in period from T-365 to T-60.
Confirm that the operation was succesful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.
